accordionwizard.title: Accordion Wizard
accordionwizard.description: Accordion wizards are used to display a process within a modal or restricted horizontal space.

axis.title: Axis
axis.description: Axes are used to show an axis bar and tick marks in a visualization.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: Badges are used to convey a status or data.

blocklist.title: Block List
blocklist.description: Block lists are used to create a navigational list of objects.

breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb
breadcrumb.description: Breadcrumbs are used in page headers to indicate the user's current location.

button.title: Button
button.description: Buttons are used to initiate an action or open a new page.

buttongroup.title: Button Group
buttongroup.description: Button groups are used to visually connect related buttons.

buttontoggle.title: Button Toggle
buttontoggle.description: Button toggles are used to switch between options or actions.

card.title: Card
card.description: Cards are clickable blocks that can represent an object or option with a title and description.

charactercounter.title: Character Counter
charactercounter.description: Character counters are used to show character limits within an input field.

checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkboxes are used to gather boolean data from a user.

description.title: Description
description.description: Descriptions are used to provide additional information about an object with its title.

dialog.title: Dialog
dialog.description: Dialogs are status-based popups that require the user to confirm an action before continuing.

divider.title: Divider
divider.description: Dividers are used to create visual separation between objects.

error.title: Error
error.description: Errors are used to provide error messaging paired with form fields.

formfield.title: Form Field
formfield.description: Form fields are used to layout the required atoms for each input within a form.

header.title: Header
header.description: Headers are used to create headings within the page using html header tags.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Icons are used to create a visual representation of an object or action.

input.title: Input
input.description: Inputs are used to gather text, numerical or temporal data from a user.

label.title: Label
label.description: Labels are used to identify data, form fields or groups of information.

legend.title: Legend
legend.description: Legends are used to display and control categories within a chart.

linechart.title: Line Chart
linechart.description: Line Charts are visualizations that display data in line form, showing each category as a different line.

link.title: Link
link.description: Links are used to navigate a user to another page.

loading.title: Loading Indicator
loading.description: Loading indicators are used to indicate loading state to a user.

modal.title: Modal
modal.description: Modals are used to support complex user actions within context.

listtable.title: List Table
listtable.description: List Tables are used to display a navigational list of objects.

pill.title: Pill
pill.description: Pills are used to represent a removable value the user has chosen.

radiobutton.title: Radio Button
radiobutton.description: Radio buttons are used to gather boolean data from a user.

radiogroup.title: Radio Group
radiogroup.description: Radio Groups are used to provide a layout for multiple radio buttons.

select.title: Select
select.description: Selects are used to provide a list of options to a user.

switch.title: Switch
switch.description: Switches are used to gather boolean data from a user.

stackedbarchart.title: Stacked Bar Chart
stackedbarchart.description: Stacked Bar Charts are visualizations that diplay data in bar form, stacking categories.

table.title: Table
table.description: Tables are used to display complex sets of data.

tabs.title: Tabs
tabs.description: Tabs are used to navigate between content blocks on a page.

text.title: Text
text.description: Text are used to format content on a page.

textarea.title: Textarea
textarea.description: Textareas are used to gather text information from a user.

charttooltip.title: Chart Tooltip
charttooltip.description: Chart Tooltips are used to display additional information within a chart.

wizardlist.title: Wizard List
wizardlist.description: Wizard lists are used to display steps and status within a wizard flow.
